name: retell-app
description: An application that can connect Retell AI agents to jambonz

verbs.label: configure settings
verbs.description: provide values for the following application-specific environment variables

options.name: pstnCarrier
options.description: the name of the carrier that you use to connect to the PSTN

options.name: retellCarrier
options.description: the name of the carrier that you have created for Retell

options.name: sipUsername
options.description: the sip username that you have created for Retell to send calls to jambonz

options.name: sipPassword
options.description: the sip password that you have created for Retell to send calls to jambonz

options.name: countryCode
options.description: the default country code to apply to non-e164 numbers

options.name: overrideCallerId
options.description: the caller id to use for outbound calls from Retell

options.name: callerIdCarousel
options.description: A comma-separated list of caller IDs to rotate through for outbound calls from Retell
